title: channels have default buffer size of ONE
body:
by **peter.buchmann.68**: 
This is a simple Documentation - Help-Text issue.

It appears to me, that channels have a default buffer size of one,
if you create them with make( chan int).

c := make( chan int, 1) behaves similar to c := make( chan int).

Please expand the Documentation/GoTour - or explain to me - 
that I am wrong
